full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 January 19, 1972 A19 790 690 Mrs. Nhat Thi Nguyen 2173 - 16th Avenue West Eugene, Oregon 97402 Dear Madam: This has reference to your application for extension of stay, which was denied on January 7, 1972. You are advised that this matter has been reopened, and, upon reconsideration, the application is granted and your authorized period of stay in the United States has been granted to July 17, 1972. Please send us your Form I-94 (Arrival-Departure Record), so that it may be endorsed to reflect this extension. Very truly yours, grm Wault WILLIAM L. PATTILLO District Director Harold Hulsing CC - Deputy Regional Commissioner, NWRO, Twin Cities, Minnesota With reference to our telephone conversation of today.
